parameter.title: Time of Interest start date/time
parameter.abstract: Time of Interest start date/time in ISO 8601 (e.g. 2016-04-21T06:50:41Z)

parameter.title: Time of Interest end date/time
parameter.abstract: Time of Interest end date/time in ISO 8601 (e.g. 2016-04-21T06:50:41Z)

parameter.title: Area of Interest expressed as a bounding box
parameter.abstract: Area of Interest expressed as min longitude,min latitude,max longitude,max latitude (e.g. 14.75,37.41,15.21,37.74)

workflow.title: Landsat 8 pan-sharpening
workflow.abstract: This processing service uses Landsat 8 panchromatic band at 15 meter resolution to provide greater detail in the Landsat 8 red, green and blue bands (4-3-2).
